catch_copy: Join the gods Zeus, Poseidon, and Hades on an epic journey to defeat Typhon, his wife Echidna, and their monstrous offspring.
copyright_text: Developer: Diego Fernandes Malinowsky / Publisher: NerdGames
description:
A war erupts to rescue Hera, Demeter, and Hestia, all captured by Typhon and his relentless minions. The fate of Olympus rests in your hands.

Core Features of Trigodpats

● TP System (Three Paths)
Trigodpats introduces the TP (Three Paths) system. Choose three paths in any order:

One grants weapons and shields

Another unlocks helmets and armor

The last reveals accessories

Your choices directly affect the difficulty and flow of the journey.

● Original Soundtrack (OST)
Enjoy a fully original soundtrack composed by the developer, featuring over 40 unique tracks. From uplifting melodies to dark and unsettling themes, the music evolves with your adventure.

● A World Full of Secrets
Explore every corner of the world. The unknown awaits: supplies, gold, equipment, and surprises hidden throughout the vast environments.

● Fully 3D World & Dynamic Camera
Trigodpats is entirely 3D, offering multiple camera angles for exploration and combat. Switch perspectives freely — including a First-Person Mode (FP Mode) for a more immersive experience.

● Charismatic NPCs
Meet a wide variety of characters throughout your journey: mortals, heroes, mythological creatures, gods, and goddesses — each with their own role in the story.

● Countless Items to Collect
Weapons, armor, accessories, and more. Explore, collect, and build your ultimate loadout.

Welcome to the battle of the gods.
